_comment: ElevenLabs Agent config for phone calls via SuperClaw
_docs: See docs/VOICE.md for full setup guide

1_prerequisites.elevenlabs_account: https://elevenlabs.io — sign up and get API key
1_prerequisites.ngrok: https://ngrok.com — needed to expose SuperClaw gateway to internet
1_prerequisites.superclaw_chat_completions: Must be enabled in superclaw.json (see configs/superclaw.json.example)

2_expose_gateway.note: Replace 18789 with your SUPERCLAW_PORT. Copy the https:// URL.

3_create_secret.description: Store your SuperClaw gateway token as an ElevenLabs secret
3_create_secret.note: Save the returned secret_id for step 4

4_create_agent.description: Create an ElevenLabs Agent pointing at your SuperClaw gateway

prompt.prompt: You are a helpful assistant connected to the SuperClaw agent network.

5_phone_number.description: Optional: Connect a Twilio phone number for inbound calls
steps: Buy a phone number at https://console.twilio.com
In ElevenLabs Agent settings, go to Phone Numbers
Enter your Twilio Account SID and Auth Token
Select the phone number to connect
Call the number — you're now talking to your agents

environment_variables.NGROK_URL: Your ngrok public URL (changes each session unless you have a paid plan)

how_it_works.flow: Phone → Twilio → ElevenLabs Agent → ngrok → SuperClaw /v1/chat/completions → Agent
how_it_works.protocol: OpenAI-compatible /v1/chat/completions — ElevenLabs treats SuperClaw as a custom LLM
